[basic]
.
:gls:`foo` :gls:`foo,bar` :gls:`term1,term2,term3 format string`
.
<document source="<string>">
    <paragraph>
        <inline gls="True" refs="foo">
            foo

        <inline gls="True" refs="foo bar">
            foo,bar

        <inline format="format string" gls="True" refs="term1 term2 term3">
            term1,term2,term3
.
